*[[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Viridian City]] *[[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] *[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]] *Chests in [[Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''XClick''' is a type of battle item. It temporarily boosts the player's Click Attack by 50% for 30 seconds. == Details == +50% Bonus to click attack == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Viridian City]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Saffron City]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} |} |} ===Dungeon Loot=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !
